column5: This is going to be a great night for fighting!  Tito "big mouth" Ortiz vs. Evans     My pick: Evans Silva Vs. Marquardt                       My pick: Silva Sherk Vs. Franca                          My pick: Franca Nogueria Vs. Herring                     My pick: Nogueria   there are a ton of fights on the card... these are the ones that interest me the most..  should be a great night!  Gerrit.
I didn't know it was on tonight so I predict, I am going to watch it...thanks
i hope tito gets his big mouth broke
I predict that I'll be watching the NASCAR Pepsi 400 at Daytona under the lights. YEE HAW!!!
anyone wants results click here for the play by play'  http://www.thefightnetwork.com/news_detail.php?nid=4248
The shark is an animal!! I'll go Evans, Silva, Sherk, Herring...with a card like the one tonite I don't mind paying $39.99

I predict 2 upsets just because this is the year of the upset: Evans and Nate And 2 favorites: Sherk and Big Nog.  I hope I'm wrong though as I'd love to see Rampage and Tito fight and a Silva Franklin rematch...  Charles
I just hope the Silva vs Nate fight is good. Nate has been in some real snoozers

I don't think Silva knows how to be in a boring fight.  He didn't let Lutter lay and pray and he knows he's in against a better fighter...  I just keep remembering him getting caught by a Ryo Chonan flying heel hook and I wonder when his next lapse will be.  Silva has all the tools to be dominant for a while though.  Charles

Tito's experience in the cage is gonna do it for him tonight . Tito by 3rd round TKO .  I see Silva losing his title tonight to a better wrestler via leg lock or decision .  Sean Sherk by Decision against an always game Franca .  Noguiera by anything he wants !
I didn't get to watch it, anyone know what the results were?
Tito & Nate was a draw Sherk won Silva won Nog won
